column4: my xp worked find with vista ics and then i booted into ubuntu and got ubuntu to work through vista ics, now i booted back to xp and vista has 2 connections , one of which is a "unidentified network" that will not allow a rename or deletion.
wierd that there are only 200+ people in the windows channel when windows has 90%+ market share, how is it linux has 2% and had 10x the users ?
there's a reason for that, people who use windows don't like it, people who use ubuntu love it
